title: My Favorite Pro Teams
name: My Favorite Pro Teams
description:
A Map by Dcrutch2

This is a map of my favorite pro teams from the NFL, NBA, and MLB.

properties.name: Busch Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2st. louisThe St. Louis Cardinals to me is America’s home team and I have actually have a cousin that works for the Cardinals. He writes out their payroll checks and I think that that is the coolest job ever. Hopefully in the near future I will have a chance to go to a home game.

properties.name: Continental Airlines Arena
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2Jason Kidd has to be one of my favorite NBA player is the league right now. All I want is to see him to win a championship; he has been through a lot from being traded from team to team in his basketball career; each time coming so close. Good Luck Jason!!!

properties.name: Dolphin Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch22269 Dan Marino Blvd., Opa Locka, FL, United StatesI love Jason Taylor!!! He is the BEST DEFENSIVE END ever. Okay for real I like the Miami Dolphins for more reason than that. Well not really!!! To be honest!!!! Former Tennessee Volunteers:Jason Allen andDavid Martin

properties.name: ESPN
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2605 3rd Ave Fl 8, New York, NYI love me some ESPN!!!! I wake up and go to sleep to SportsCenter everyday! I live for sports!!!

properties.name: Georiga Dome
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2atlantaTo me there would be no Atlanta Falcons with Michael Vick. Vick is known for his 360 degree spin, forward/back flip, and his stiff arm; it was because of his spectacular moves on the field that caught my eye and has had me hook for years. The Virginia Tech quarterback is not the only Vick in the family that is doing big things. Little brother Marcus Vick followed in his footsteps to be two of the best quarterback at VA Tech. And at this time I will like to take a moment and say that my thoughts and prayers go out to those that lost their lives in this recent tragedy. I also would like to note that Michael Vick has teamed up with the United Way to donate 0,000 to assist families affected by the massacre at Virginia Tech.

properties.name: Heniz field
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2pittsburgh pa My dad is a huge Pittsburgh Steelers fan and it is because of his love for the Steelers, that I have become a fan also. The team as allowed me and my father to bond as we sit together and cheer on his team. It is a sight to see my father scream and cheer on his team with his terrible towel. Go Steelers! And I would like to thank Bill Cowher and Jerome Bettis for all their hard work and that they will truly be missed! Former Tennessee Volunteers: Cedrick Wilson

properties.name: LP Field
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch21 Titans Way, Nashville, TNBeing from Tennessee I would have to say that the MIGHTY Tennessee Titans is my favorite team. I have followed the team since they were the Memphis Oilers. I have seen the team go from losing the super bowl by inches, from countless losing seasons, until to now. The Titans are a young up and coming team under the leadership of Vince Young. I believe that with his leadership next season we go all the way. Go Titans!!! Former Tennessee Volunteers: Jesse Mahelona and Albert Haynesworth

properties.name: Lincoln Financial Field
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2I love the Philadelphia Eagles and I really don’t know why. Every since Donavan McNabb became an Eagles I have been following the team. I love his determination on and off the field, and you have to love his Campbell’s Soup commercials. They the best. This season I can say that I really did watch the team more because of the new addition to their team, Omar Gaither, an outstanding rookie from the University of Tennessee, and hopefully the Eagles can be just successful as they were last season. Former Tennessee Volunteers: Omar Gaither

properties.name: Monster Park (Formerly Candlestick Park)
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2  602 Jamestown Ave, San Francisco, CAI recently became a San Francisco 49ers fan this season; this is because of a recent addition or player to their team, Parys Haralson. While Parys was here at UT he became a big brother to me and I would like to wish him Good Luck for next season. Former Tennessee Volunteers: Parys Haralson and Aubrayo Franklin

properties.name: San Diego Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2, , CALike many pro athletes like Jerome Bettis and Shaun Alexander the name LaDainian Tomlinson has become a household name. He has proven to be the NFL’s best player at San Diego Chargers setting the all-time rushing yards. Off the field he has touched many lives through his new foundation to promote education and social awareness to youth. He will and forever will have a lasting effect in the NFL, on and off the field.

properties.name: Yankee Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Dcrutch2yankee stadiumI love me some Alex Rodriquez and Derek Jeter. Since they have been on the same team, I have made it my duty to watch every televised game possible. In 2004 just before I came to the University of Tennessee I had the opportunity to see Yankee Stadium. It was so awesome and I will never forget that day. Hopefully one day I will have the chance to go to a home game.
